caption.title: tertiary structure of severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (SARS-CoV) helicase (PDB 6JYT, 2.8 Å, Nsp13). The domains are zinc-binding (ZBD) (light green), stalk (orange), 1B (pink), 1A (cyan) and 2A (blue). The zinc atoms are shown as gray spheres. Image created using Maestro, release 2020-1 (Maestro, Schrödinger, LLC, New York, NY, 2020).
